name: PerformSearchAndAnswer
description:
Performs search and provides an answer or summary.

This tool executes a search based on the input query. It returns either a direct answer or a detailed summary with citations, adapting to the type of query provided.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The question or query to be answered by the search tool.

value_schema.description: The question or query to answer.

parameters.name: enable_streaming_response
parameters.description: Set to true to receive the response as a server-sent events (SSS) stream.

value_schema.description: If true, the response is returned as a server-sent events (SSS) stream.

parameters.name: include_full_text_content
parameters.description: Set to true to include full text content in the search results.

value_schema.description: If true, the response includes full text content in the search results
